title: How does Misty Step work with Divine Smite?

posts.author: InitiativeTracker
posts.content:
I've been thinking about Divine lately and wanted to get everyone's opinions.

Quick question about Divine that came up in our game last night.

I'd love to hear everyone's experiences with Divine and how it's worked in your games.

What do you all think? Has anyone else had similar questions about Divine?
posts.thread_title: How does Misty Step work with Divine Smite?

posts.author: DMScreener
posts.content:
The way I understand the rules for work, it should work like this: when you take the action, you need to roll ability checks to determine the outcome.

How do other DMs balance encounters that involve work? I find it either makes combats too easy or too difficult.

Has anyone tried optimizing a build around work? I'm curious about the best way to leverage this for my character.

I actually disagree with some of the previous comments about work. Based on my experience, it works differently.
